main_definition: to continue to be in the same state, condition, or place.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To stay in a particular location after leaving others behind.
meanings_and_examples.example: After the tour ended, I remained at my hotel for a couple of days.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To continue to be or hold as before; unchanged or undisturbed.
meanings_and_examples.example: Despite all the chaos around them, they remained committed to their cause.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not being able to solve a problem despite efforts and attempts.
meanings_and_examples.example: I tried different approaches, but nothing seemed to have worked. The issue remained unresolved.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To be left over after the main part has been dealt with or removed.
meanings_and_examples.example: After everyone had gone home, only a few items remained on the table.
